description: My website where you'll find all my latest projects and, also, a little bit about who I am.

hero.headline: Hi! My name is Elias Pereyra

second-col.and: and with a great taste for

turnos.first-paragraph: A patient consultation appointment management system. You can register, enter your details, and book an appointment. You will then receive an SMS notification confirming whether the appointment was approved or not.
turnos.second-paragraph: This helps simplify the process of booking an appointment with the doctor. It reduces waiting time for the patient and streamlines the appointment management process for the doctor.
turnos.third-paragraph: The system is developed with Appwrite (a BaaS - cloud-based service) and Next.js. This project helped me see the potential of Appwrite, which simplifies the development of Fullstack web applications.

work.title: What I do

work.second-desc: The projects I carry out independently are also designed by me, and I use two favorite tools interchangeably for this process:  and Penpot.
work.third-desc: In addition to web development, I volunteer by making open-source contributions, translating articles into Spanish for the freeCodeCamp community. You can check out the articles I've translated
